title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Practitioner-Tailored Instructional Design Course for Introduction to Pharmacology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain pharmacokinetic properties (absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion) by major drug classifications.
Learners can explain molecular mechanisms of drug-receptor interactions through case analysis.
Learners can propose drug interaction management and adverse effect strategies based on real clinical scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
